text: Mariam Petrosyan (; born 1991) is a Russian-Armenian singer and songwriter. She is best known for competing in season 2 of Depi Evratesil 2018 with the song Fade, which qualified for the final. In 2014, Petrosyan competed in a competition-festival I love New York and won it with her own song. In October 2016, she also entered a competition called Songwriting competition in London and reached the final. This year, Mariam along with Alpha Lighting System was the winner of 7 Notes Challenge, with her own song Here I Come, a competition organized by Serj Tankian. Tankian has commented on the song by saying "A hauntingly beautiful song that won't leave me." ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |+As herself ! Year ! title: Mariam Petrosyan (singer)
